Content-Type: text/plain; charset=ISO-8859-1
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

Hello all,

During the last year or so we have been working on a RESTful transaction
model in the University of Surrey. The goal was to have ACID Transactions,
while carefully maintaining all the constraints of REST, including HATEOAS,
oxymoronical as that may sound.

The model, its motivations and some examples are described in the following
location:
http://www.opadoi.gr/RETROv0.1.pdf

We intend to look into long-running transactions in the future but felt it
better to focus on an ACID-based proof-of-concept before proceeding further.


I was hoping to be able to polish it a little bit more before publishing to
this list, but given the very interesting discussion, I think it is better
to contribute a draft version now and incorporate feedback as it comes in.

I hope the work is interesting to the list and all discussion is welcomed.

Regards,
Alexandros

--0016e6d27c90c35add046bf2d293
